content.question: What observation does Ms. Morita make?

choices.label: People with small children often occupy Silver Seats.
Fewer people seem to be using Silver Seats these days.
The manners of people using public transportation have gotten worse.
People who use Silver Seats feel embarrassed.

content.answer: The manners of people using public transportation have gotten worse.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
